underlying_goal: To implement the planned fix for the startup hang and continue debugging when the fix proves insufficient.
friction_detail: The implemented fix for the marketplace path did not solve the startup hang. Subsequent debugging was inconclusive, with Claude trying various commands without finding the new root cause before the session ended.
primary_success: Correctly implemented the template-based system in `deploy.sh` to generate absolute paths for plugin configurations.
brief_summary: Claude implemented the planned fix to use absolute paths for plugin marketplaces, but this did not resolve the startup hang. Further debugging attempts, including checking logs and killing processes, were unsuccessful, and the session ended with the issue unresolved.
